channel.title: denotational semantics on Peter Mosses
channel.description: Recent content in denotational semantics on Peter Mosses

item.title: Denotational Semantics in Agda
item.description: This project (started in 2024) aims to make it straightforward to take an existing denotational semantics of a programming language, and use Agda to check its well-formedness, as well to prove properties of individual programs.

item.title: SIS
item.description: SIS (semantics implementation system, 1972â€“1979) used partial evaluation to run programs according to their denotational semantics.
